verses.padam: - Padam vIti|vai|Etasya̍|yajñaḥ|RuddhyatE|yasya̍|haviḥ|atiricya̍ta̍ ityati̍ - ricyatE|sUrya̍ḥ|dEvaḥ|diviṣadBya̍ iti# diviṣat - Byaḥ|iti|Aha|bRuhaspati̍nA|ca|Eva|asya|prajApa̍tinEti̍# prajA - patinA|ca|yajñasya|vyRu̍ddhamiti̍ vi - Ruddham|apIti|vapati|rakṣAṃ̍si|vai|Etat|paśum|sacantE|yat|EkadEvatya̍# ityEka̍ - dEvatyaḥ|Ala̍bdha̍ ityA - labdhaḥ|BUyAn|Bava̍ti|yasyA̱ḥ|tE|hari̍taḥ|garBa̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|dEvatrEti̍# dEva - trA|Eva|EnAm|gamayati|rakṣasAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|Eti|vartana|vartaya|iti̍|Aha|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vi vA Etasya# yajña RuddhyatE̍ yasya# haviratiricya̍tE̍ sUryO# dEvO diviṣadBya̍ ityAha̍ bRuhaspatinA̍ caivAsya# prajApatinA̍ ca yajñasya vyRuddhamapi̍# vapati rakṣAṃsi̍ vA Etat paśuṃ sacantE̍ yadEkadEvatya̍# AlabdhO̍ BUyAn Bavati̍ yasyA̱stE haritO̍ garBa ityAha̍ dEvatraivainA̱M gamayati rakṣasAmapa̍hatyA̍ A vartana̍ vartayEtyAha̍ - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam brahmaṇA|Eva|Enam|Eti̍|vartayati|vIti̍|tE|Binadmi|takarIm|iti̍|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|urudraPsa ityuru̍ - draPsaḥ|viśvarUpa̍ iti# viśva - rUpaḥ|induḥ|iti̍|Aha|prajEti̍# pra - jA|vai|paśavaḥ|indu̍ḥ|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|Eva|Enam|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|samiti|arddhayati|diva̱m|vai|yajñasya̍|vyRu̍ddhamiti̍ vi-Ruddham|gacCati|pRuthivIm|atiriktamityati̍# - riktam|tat|yat|na|śamayE̱t|Arti̱m|Eti|RucCEt|yaja̍mAnaḥ|mahI|dyauḥ|pRuthivI|ca|naḥ|iti̍|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: brahmaṇaivainamA̍ vartayati̍ vi tE# Binadmi takarImityAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitadu-̍ rudraPsO viśvarUpa̍ indurityAha̍ prajA vai paśava induḥ̍ prajayaivainaM̍ paśuBiḥ samarddhayati̍ divaM ~Mvai yajñasya vyRuddhaM̍ gacCati pRuthivImatiriktaM̍ tadyanna śamayEdArtimArcCEd-yajamAnO̍ mahI dyauḥ pRuthivIca̍# na ityA# - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam Aha|dyAvApRuthivIByAmiti̍ dyAvA̱ - pRuthivIByA̱m|Eva|yajñasya|vyRu̍ddhamiti̍ vi - Ruddham|ca|atiriktamityati̍# - riktam|ca|śamayati|na|Arti̱m|Eti|RucCati|yaja̍mAnaḥ|Basma̍nA|aBi|samiti̍|Uhati|svagAkRu̍tyA̍ iti# svagA - kRutyai|athO iti|anayO̱ḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|garBa̍ḥ|anayO̱ḥ|Eva|Enam|dadhAti|yat|avadyEditya̍va-dyEt|atIti̍|tat|rEcayEt|yat|na|avadyEditya̍va̍ - dyEt|paśOḥ|AlabdhasyEtyA-labdhasya|na|avEti̍|dyEt|purastA̱t|nAByA̱ḥ|anyat|avadyEditya̍va̍ - dyEt|upariṣṭAt|anyat|purastA̱t|vai|nAByai̱|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ha dyAvApRuthivIByA̍mEva̍ yajñasya vyRuddhaM̍ cAtiriktaM̍ ca śamayati nA&&*rtimArcCati̍ yajamAnO̍ BasmanA&Bi̍ samUhati̍ svagAkRutyA̍ athO# anayOrvA Eṣa garBO&nayOrEvaina̍M̍ dadhAti yadavadyEdati̍ tadrEcayEdyannAvadyEt̍ paśOrAlabdhasya̍ nAva# dyEt purastAnnAByA# anyadavadyE-dupari̍ṣṭAdanyat̍ purastAdvai nAByai̱ - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|upariṣṭAt|apAna̍ ityapa-anaḥ|yAvAn̍|Eva|paśuḥ|tasya̍|avEti̍|dyati|viṣṇa̍vE|śipiviṣṭAyEti̍# śipi - viṣṭAya|juhOti|yat|vai|yajñasya̍|atiricya̍ta̍ ityati̍ - ricyatE|yaḥ|paśOḥ|BUmA|yA|puṣṭi̍ḥ|tat|viṣṇu̍ḥ|śipiviṣṭa̍ iti# śipi - viṣṭaḥ|atirikta̍ ityati# - riktE|Eva|atiriktamityati̍# - riktam|dadhAti|atiriktasyEtyati̍# - riktasya|śAntyai̱|aṣṭAprUḍityaṣṭA - prUṭ|hiraṇyam|dakṣi̍ṇA|aṣṭApadItyaṣṭA̍ - padI|hi|EṣA|AtmA|navamaḥ|paśOḥ|Aptyai̱|antarakOśa ityantara̍ - kOśE|uṣṇIṣEṇa|Avi̍ṣṭitamityA̍ - viṣṭitam|Bavati|Evam|iva|hi|paśuḥ|ulba̱m|iva ( )|carma|iva|mAṃqsam|iva|asthi̍|iva|yAvAn̍|Eva|paśuḥ|tam|AptvA|avEti̍|rundhE|yasya̍|EṣA|yajñE|prAya̍ścittiḥ|kriyatE̱|iṣṭvA|vasI̍yAn|Bavati||4̍ (71) (vartayatyAha-na̍ iti-vai nAByA-ulbamivai-ka̍viṃśatiśca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: prAṇa upariṣṭAdapAnO̍ yAvAnEva̍ paśustasyAva# dyati viṣṇavE̍ śipiviṣṭAya# juhOti yadvai yajñasyAtiricya̍tE̍ yaḥ paśOrBUmA yA puṣṭistad-viṣṇuḥ̍ śipiviṣṭO &tirikta̍ EvAtiriktaM̍ dadhAtyatiriktasya̍ śAntyA# aṣṭAprUḍḍhiraṇyaM̍ dakṣiṇA&ṣṭApa̍dI̍ hyEṣA̍ &&tmA navamaḥ̍ paśOrAptyA# antarakOśa uṣṇIṣEṇA&&*viṣṭitaM̍ BavatyEvamiva̍ hi paśurulbamiva̍ ( ) carmEva̍ mAṃqsamivAsthIva̍ yAvAnEva̍ paśustamAptvA&va# rundhEyasyaiṣA yajñE prAyaścittiḥ̍ kriyata# iṣṭvA vasIyAn̍ Bavati||4 (vartayatyAha-na̍ iti-vai nAByA-ulbamivai-ka̍viṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|vAyO̍ iti|BUṣa|śucipA̍ iti# śuci - pAḥ|upEti|naḥ|sahasra̱m|tE|niyuta̍ iti# ni - yutaḥ|viśvavArEti̍# viśva - vAra||upO iti|tE|andha̍ḥ|madya̱m|ayAmi|yasya̍|dEva|dadhiṣE|pUrvapEyamiti̍# pUrva - pEya̱m||AkU̱tyA ityA-kUtyai|tvA|kAmAya|tvA|samRudha̍ iti# saM - RudhE̱|tvA|kikkiṭA|tE|manaḥ|prajApa̍taya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|svAhA̱|kikkiṭA|tE|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|vAyavE̱|svAhA̱|kikkiṭA|tE|cakṣuḥ|sUryA̍ya|svAhA̱|kikkiṭA|tE|śrOtra̱m|dyAvA̍pRuthivIByAmiti̍ dyAvA̱-pRuthivIByA̱m|svAhA̱|kikkiṭA|tE|vAca̱m|sarasvatyai|svAhA̱|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: A vAyO̍ BUṣa śucipA upa# naḥ sahasraM̍ tE niyutO# viśvavAra|upO# tE andhO madyamayAmi̍ yasya# dEva dadhiṣE pU̱rvapEya̱M||AkU̱tyai tvA kAmAya̍ tvA samRudhE̱ tvA kikkiṭA tE manaḥ̍ prajApatayE̍ svAhA# kikkiṭA tE̱ prAṇaM ~MvAyavE svAhA# kikkiṭA tE cakṣuḥ sUryAya̍ svAhA# kikkiṭA tE śrOtraM dyAvApRuthivIByAṅq̍ svAhA# kikkiṭA tE vAcaṃq sarasvatyai̍ svAhA- [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam tvam|turIyA̱|vaśinI̱|vaśA|asi|sakRut|yat|tvA|manasA|garBa̍ḥ|Eti̍|aśa̍yat||vaśA|tvam|vaśinI̱|gacCa|dEvAn|satyAḥ|santu|yaja̍mAnasya|kAmA̱ḥ||ajA|asi|rayiṣṭhEti̍# rayi - sthA|pRuthivyAm|sIda|UrddhvA|antarikṣam|upEti̍|tiṣṭhasva|divi|tE|bRuhat|BAḥ||tantu̱m|tanvann|raja̍saḥ|BAnum|anviti̍|ihi|jyOti̍ṣmataḥ|pathaḥ|rakṣa|dhiyA|kRutAn||anulbaṇam|vayata|jOgu̍vAm|apa̍ḥ|manu̍ḥ(̍ )|Bava|janaya|daivya̱m|jana̱m||mana̍saḥ|haviḥ|asi|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|varṇaḥ|gAtrA̍ṇAm|tE|gAtraBAja̍ iti# gAtra - BAjaḥ|BUyAsma||6̍ (63)
verses.samhita: tvaM turIyA# vaśinI# vaśA&si# sakRudyat tvA manasA̍ garBa A&śayat|vaśA̍ tvaM ~MvaśinI# gacCa dEvAnth-satyAḥ santu̍ yajamAnasya̍ kAmA̱ḥ||ajA&si# rayiṣṭhA pRuthivyAṃ̍ sIdOrddhvA&ntari̍kṣamupa̍# tiṣṭhasva divi tE# bRuhadBAḥ||tantuM̍ tanvan rajasO̍ BAnumanvihi̍ jyOtiṣmataḥ̍ pathO rakṣa̍ dhiyA kRutAn||anulbaṇaM ~Mvayata̍ jOguvAmapO̍ manu# ( ) rBava janayA daivyaM jana̱M||manasO̍ havirasi̍ prajApatErvarṇO̍ gAtrAṇAM̍ tE gAtraBAjO# BUyAsma||6

verses.padam: - Padam imE iti|vai|saha|AstAm|tE̍ iti|vAyuḥ|vIti̍|avAt|tE̍ iti|garBa̱m|adadhAtAm|tam|sOma̍ḥ|prEti̍|ajanayat|agniḥ|agrasata|saḥ|Etam|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|AgnEyam|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|apaśyat|tam|niriti|avapat|tEna̍|Eva|EnAm|agnEḥ|adhi̍|niriti̍|akrIṇAt|tasmA̱t|apIti̍|anyadEvatyA̍mitya̍nya̍ - dEvatyA̱m|AlaBamAna̍ ityA̱ - laBamAnaḥ|AgnEyam|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA-kapAlam|purastA̱t|niriti̍|vapEt|agnEḥ|Eva|EnAm|adhIti̍|niṣkrIyEti̍# niḥ - krIya|Eti̍|laBatE|yat|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: imE vai sahA&&*stAM tE vAyurvyavAt̍ tE garBamadadhAtAM̍ taṃ sOmaḥ prAjanaya-dagnira̍grasata̍ sa EtaM prajApatirAgnEya-maṣṭAka̍pAlamapaśyat̍ taM niravapat̍ tEnaivainAmagnEradhi̍ nirakrIṇAt̍ tasmAdapyanyadEvatyA̍mAlaBa̍mAna̍ AgnEyamaṣṭAkapAlaM̍ purastAnnirvapEdagnErEvainAmadhi̍# niṣkrIyA&&laBatE̍ yad - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam vAyuḥ|vyavAditi# vi - avA̱t|tasmA̱t|vAyavyA̱|yat|imE iti|garBa̱m|ada̍dhAtAm|tasmA̱t|dyAvApRuthivyEti̍# dyAvA - pRuthivyA̱|yat|sOmaḥ|prEti̍|aja̍nayat|agniḥ|agra̍sata|tasmA̱t|agnIṣOmIyEtya̍gnI-sOmIyA̱|yat|anayO̱ḥ|viyatyOriti̍# vi - yatyOḥ|vAk|avadat|tasmA̱t|sArasvatI|yat|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|agnEḥ|adhIti|nirakrI̍ṇAditi̍# niḥ - akrIṇAt|tasmA̱t|prAjApatyEti̍# prAjA - patyA|sA|vai|EṣA|sarvadEvatyEti# sarva - dEvatyA̱|yat|ajA|vaśA|vAyavyA̱m|Eti|laBEta|BUti̍kAma̍ iti BUti# - kAmaḥ|vAyuḥ|vai|kṣEpiṣṭhA|dEvatA̱|vAyum|Eva|svEna̍|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAyurvyavAt tasmA̱d-vAyavyA# yadimE garBamadadhAtAM̍ tasmA̱d-dyAvApRuthivyA# yath sOmaḥ prAjanayadagniragra̍sata̍ tasmAdagnIṣOmIyA̍ yadanayO̱rviyatyOr-vAgavadat̍ tasmA̱th sArasvatI yat prajApatiragnEradhi̍# nirakrIṇAt̍ tasmA̱t prAjApatyA sA vA EṣA sarvadEvatyA̍# yadajA vaśA vAyavyA̍mA̍ laBEta̍ BUtikAmO̍ vAyurvai kṣEpiṣṭhA̍ dEvatA# vAyumEva svEna-̍ [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam BAgadhEyEnEti# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|Enam|BUti̱m|gamayati|dyAvApRuthivyA̍miti̍# dyAvA - pRuthivyA̱m|Eti|laBEta|kRuṣamA̍ṇaḥ|pratiṣṭhAkA̍ma̍ iti# pratiṣṭhA-kAmaḥ|divaḥ|Eva|asmai|parjanyaḥ|varq.ṣati|vIti̍|asyAm|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|rOhanti|samarddhu̍kamiti̍# saM - arddhukam|asya|sasyam|Bavati|agnIṣOmIyAmitya̍gnI-sOmIyA̱m|Eti̍|laBEta|yaḥ|kAmayE̍ta|anna̍vAnnityanna̍# - vAn|annAda ityanna̍ - adaḥ|syAm|iti|agninA̱|Eva|anna̱m|avEti̍|rundhE|sOmE̍na|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|annavAnnityanna̍# - vAn|Eva|annAda ityanna̍ - adaḥ|Bavati|sArasvatIm|Eti|laBEta|yaḥ|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvainaM BUtiM̍ gamayati dyAvApRuthivyAmA̍ laBEta̍ kRuṣamAṇaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhAkAmO̍ diva EvAsmai# parjanyO# vaṛṣati vyasyAmOṣa̍dhayO̍ rOhanti samarddhukamasya̍ sasyaM BavatyagnIṣOmIyAmA̍ laBEta̍ yaḥ kAmayEtAnnavAnannAdaḥ̍ syAmityagninaivAnnamava# rundhE sOmEnAnnAdya-manna̍vAnEvAnnAdO̍ Bavati̍ sArasvatImA laBEta̍ ya - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam Iśvaraḥ|vAcaḥ|vaditOḥ|sann|vAca̱m|na|vadE̱t|vAk|vai|sara̍svatI|sara̍svatIm|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|sA|Eva|asminn|vAca̱m|dadhAti|prAjApatyAmiti̍# prAjA - patyAm|Eti|laBEta|yaḥ|kAmayE̍ta|ana̍Bijitamityana̍Bi̍ - jitam|aBIti|jayEyam|iti̍|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|dEvatABiḥ|Eva|ana̍Bijitamityana̍Bi̍ - jitam|aBIti|jayati|vAyavya̍yA|upAka̍rOtIyu̍pa̍ - AkarOti|vAyOḥ|Eva|EnAm|avaruddhyEtya̍va̍ - ruddhya|Eti̍|laBatE|AkU̱tyA̍ ityA - kUtyai|tvA|kAmAya|tvA|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: I̱śvarO vAcO vaditOḥ̍ san. vAcaM navadEd-vAgvai sarasvatI̍ sarasvatImEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati saivAsmin. vAcaM̍ dadhAti prAjApatyAmA laBEta̍ yaḥ kAmayEtAnaBijitamaBi̍ jayEyamiti̍# prajApatiḥ̍ sarvA# dEvatA# dEvatABirEvA-na̍BijitamaBi̍ jayati̍ vAyavyayOpAka̍rOti̍ vAyOrEvainAmavaruddhyA&&*la̍Bata̍ AkU̱tyai tvA kAmAya̍ tvE - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam iti|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|kikkiṭAkAramiti# kikkiṭA - kAra̱m|juhOti|kikkiṭAkArEṇEti# kikkiṭA - kArEṇa|vai|grAmyAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|ramantE|prEti̍|AraṇyAḥ|patanti|yat|kikkiṭAkAramiti̍# kikkiṭA - kAra̱m|juhOti|grAmyAṇA̱m|paśUnAm|dhRutyai̱|parya̍gnAviti̍ pari-agnau|kriyamA̍ṇE|juhOti|jIva̍ntIm|Eva|EnAm|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|gamayati|tvam|turIyA̱|vaśinI̱|vaśA|asi|iti|Aha|dEvatrEti̍# dEva - trA|Eva|EnAm|gamayati|satyAḥ|santu|yajamAnasya|kAmA̱ḥ|iti̍|Aha|Eṣaḥ|vai|kAma̍ḥ|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tyAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitat kikkiṭAkAra̍M̍ juhOti kikkiṭAkArEṇa vai grAmyAḥ paśavO# ramantE prA&&*raṇyAḥ patanti̍ yat kikkiṭAkAra̍M̍ juhOti# grAmyAṇA̱M paśUnAM dhRutyai paryagnau̍ kriyamAṇE̍ juhOti jIvantImEvainAṃ̍# suvargaM ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ tvaM turIyA# vaśinI# vaśA&sItyAha̍ dEvatraivainA̱M gamayati satyAḥ santu̍ yajamAnasya̍ kAmA ityAhaiṣa̍ vai kAmO - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam yajamAnasya|yat|anA̱rtaḥ|udRucamityu̍t̍ - Ruca̱m|gacCati|tasmA̱t|Evam|Aha|ajA|asi|rayiṣṭhEti̍# rayi - sthA|iti|Aha|Eṣu|Eva|EnAm|lOkEṣu̍|pratIti̍|sthApayati|divi|tE|bRuhat|BAḥ|iti̍|Aha|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ- gE|Eva|asmai|lOkE|jyOtiḥ|dadhAti|tantu̱m|tanvann|raja̍saḥ|BAnum|anviti̍|ihi|iti̍|Aha|imAn|Eva|asmai|lOkAn|jyOti̍ṣmataḥ|karOti|anulbaṇam|vayata|jOgu̍vAm|apa̍ḥ|iti̍|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajamAnasya̍ yadanA̱rta udRucaM gacCati̍ tasmAdEvamA̍hA&jA&si̍# rayiṣṭhEtyAhai̍ ṣvEvainA̱M̍ ~MlOkEṣu pratiṣṭhApayati̍ divi tE# bRuhadBA ityAha̍ suvarga EvAsmai# lOkE jyOtir̍ dadhAti tantuM̍ tanvan rajasO̍ BAnumanvihItyAhEmAnEvAsmai̍# lOkAn jyOtiṣmataḥ̍ karOtyanulbaṇaM ~Mvayata̍ jOguvAmapa̍ ityA-̍ [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam Aha|yat|Eva|yajñE|ulbaṇa̱m|kriyatE̱|tasya|Eva|EṣA|śAnti̍ḥ|manu̍ḥ|Bava|janaya̍|daivya̱m|jana̱m|iti̍|Aha|mAnavya̍ḥ|vai|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|tAḥ|Eva|AdyA̱ḥ|kurutE|manasaḥ|haviḥ|asi|iti̍|Aha|svagAkRu̍tyA̍ iti# svagA - kRutyai|gAtrAṇAm|tE|gAtraBAja̍ iti# gAtra - BAjaḥ|BUyAsma|iti̍|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE|tasyai̱|vai|EtasyA̱ḥ|Eka̱m|Eva|adE̍vayajanamityadE̍va̍ - yajanam|yat|AlabdhAyAmityA̍ - labdhAyAm|aBraḥ|13 (50)
verses.samhita: -ha yadEva yajña ulbaṇaM̍ kriyatE tasyaivaiṣA śAntirmanurBava̍ janayA daivyaM janamityAha̍ mAnavyO# vai prajAstA EvA&&*dyA̱ḥ kurutE manasO̍ havirasItyAha̍ svagAkRutyai̍ gAtrAṇAM̍ tE gAtraBAjO# BUyAsmEtyAhA̍ &&*śiṣamEvaitAmA̍ śA̱stE tasyai vA EtasyA EkamEvA-dE̍vayajanaM̍ ~MyadAlabdhAyAmaBrO̍ - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|yat|Ala̍bdhAyAmityA̍ - labdhAyAm|aBraḥ|syAt|aPsvityap-su|vA|pravEśayEditi̍# pra - vEśayE̱t|sarvA̱m|vA|prEti|aśnIyAt|yat|aPsvitya̍p̍ - su|pravEśayEditi# pra - vEśayE̱t|yajñavEśasamiti# yajña - vEśasam|kuryAt|sarvA̱m|Eva|prEti|aśnIyAt|indriyam|Eva|Atman|dhattE|sA|vai|EṣA|trayAṇAm|Eva|ava̍ruddhEtyava̍# - ruddhA|saM~Mvathsarasada iti# saM~Mvathsara - sadaḥ|sahasrayAjina̍ iti# sahasra - yAjinaḥ|gRuhamEdhina̍ iti# gRuha - mEdhinaḥ|tE|Eva|EtayA̱|yajErann|tEṣA̱m|Eva|EṣA|AptA||14̍ (42) (yath - svEna# - sArasvatImA laBEta̍ yaḥ - kAmAya̍ tvA - kAmO - &pa itya - BrO - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: Bavati̍ yadAlabdhAyAmaBraḥ̍ syAdaPsu vA̱pravEśayEth sarvA̱M ~MvA prAś~jIyAdyadaPsu̍ pravEśayE̱dyajñavEśasaM̍ kuryAth̍ sarvAmEva̍ prAś~jIyAdindriyamEvA&&*tman̍ dhat̍ tE sA vA EṣA trayAṇAmEvAva̍# ruddhA saM~Mvathsarasadaḥ̍ sahasrayAjinO# gRuhamEdhinasta EvaitayA# yajEran tEṣAmEvaiṣA&&ptA||14̍ (yath - svEna# - sArasvatImA laBEta̍ yaḥ - kAmAya̍ tvA - kAmO - &pa itya - BrO - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam cittam|ca|cittiḥ|ca|AkU̍tamityA̍ - kUtam|ca|AkUtirityA̍ - kUtiḥ|ca|vijñAtamiti̍ vi - jñAtam|ca|vijñAnamiti# vi-jñAna̱m|ca|manaḥ|ca|śakva̍rIḥ|ca|daṛśa̍ḥ|ca|pUrṇamA̍sa̍ iti# pUrṇa - mAsaḥ|ca|bRuhat|ca|rathantaramiti# rathaM - taram|ca|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|jayAn|indrA̍ya|vRuṣṇE̱|prEti̍|ayacCat|ugraḥ|pRutanAjyE̍ṣu|tasmai̱|viśa̍ḥ|samiti̍|anamanta|sarvA̱ḥ|saḥ|ugraḥ|saḥ|hi|havya̍ḥ|baBUva̍|dEvAsurA̍ iti# dEva - asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti saM - yattAḥ|Asann|saḥ|indraḥ|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|upEti# ( )|adhAvat|tasmai̱|EtAn|jayAn|prEti̍|ayacCat|tAn|ajuhOt|tata̍ḥ|vai|dEvAḥ|asu̍rAn|ajayann|yat|aja̍yann|tat|jayA̍nAm|jayatvamiti̍# jaya - tvam|sparddhamAnEna|EtE|hOtavyA̱ḥ|jaya̍ti|Eva|tAm|pRuta̍nAm||15̍ (75)(upa - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: cittaM ca cittiścA &&*kUtaM̍ cA&&*kUtiśca̍ vijñAtaM̍ ca vijñAnaM̍ ca manaśca̍ śakvarIśca̍ daṛśaśca̍ pUrṇamAsaśca̍ bRuhacca# rathantaraM ca# prajApatirjayAnindrA̍ya̍ vRuṣṇE prAyacCadugraḥ̍ pRutanAjyE̍ṣu̍ tasmai viśaḥ samanamanta̍ sarvAḥ sa ugraḥ sahi havyO# baBUvadEvAsurAḥ̍ saM~MyattA̍ Asanthsa indraḥ̍ prajApatimupA̍# ( ) dhAvat tasmA# EtA~jjayAn prAyacCat̍ tAnajuhOt̍ tatO vai dEvA asurAnajayana.̍ yadajayan̍ tajjayAnAM̍ jayatvaṅ sparddhamAnEnaitE̍ hOtavyA̍# jayatyEva̍ tAM pRutanAM||15̍ (upa - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agniḥ|BUtAnA̱m|adhipatirityadhi̍-̍ patiḥ|saḥ|mA|avatu|indraḥ|jyEṣṭhAnA̱m|yamaḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|vAyuḥ|antari̍kṣasya|sUrya̍ḥ|divaḥ|candramA̱ḥ|nakṣa̍trAṇAm|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|brahma̍ṇaḥ|mitraḥ|satyAnA̱m|varu̍ṇaḥ|apAm|samudraḥ|srOtyAnA̱m|anna̱m|sAmrA̱jyAnAmiti̍ sAM - rAjyAnAm|adhipatItyadhi̍-pati|tat|mA|avatu|sOma̍ḥ|Oṣa̍dhInAm|savitA|prasavAnAmiti̍# pra - savAnA̱m|rudraḥ|paśUnAm|tvaṣṭA̱|rUpAṇA̱m|viṣṇuḥ|parva̍tAnAm|maruta̍ḥ|gaṇAnA̱m|adhi̍pataya̍ ityadhi# - patayaḥ|tE|mA|avantu|pitaraḥ|pitAmahAḥ|parE|avarE̍ ( )|tatA̱ḥ|tatAmahAḥ|iha|mA|avata||asminn|brahmann|asminn|kṣatrE|asyAm|AśiṣItyA̱̍ - śiṣi|asyAm|purOdhAyAmiti̍# puraḥ - dhAyA̱m|asminn|karmann|asyAm|dEvahU̱tyAmiti̍# dEva - hUtyAm||16 (67)
verses.samhita: agnirBUtAnAmadhipatiḥ̍ samA&vatvindrO̱̍ jyEṣṭhAnA̱M ~Myamaḥ pRuthivyA̍ vAyurantarikṣasya̍ sUryOdivaścandramA̍ nakṣatrAṇAM̍ bRuhaspatirbrahmaṇO̍ mitraḥ satyAnAM ~MvaruṇO&pAṃ̍ samudraḥ̍ srOtyAnAmannaṃq sAmrA̱jyAnAmadhipati̍ tanmA&vatu̍ sOma OṣadhInAṃ̍ savitA prasavAnAṃ̍# rudraḥ paśUnAM̍ tvaṣṭA# rUpAṇAM ~Mviṣṇuḥ parvatAnAM̍ marutO# gaṇAnAmadhipatayastE̍ mAvantu̍ pitaraḥ̍ pitAmahAḥ parE&varE ( ) tatA̱statAmahA iha mA&vata|asmin̍ brahmannasmin̍ kṣatrE̱&syA-mAśiṣyasyAM purOdhAyA̍masmin-karma̍nnasyAM̍ dEvahU̱tyAM||16

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|vai|yat|yajñE|akurvata|tat|asu̍rAḥ|akurvata|tE|dEvAḥ|EtAn|aByAtAnAnitya̍Bi̍ - AtAnAn|apaśyann|tAn|aByAtanvatEtya̍Bi̍ - Atanvata|yat|dEvAnA̱m|karma̍|AsI̱t|Arddhya̍ta|tat|yat|asu̍rAṇAm|na|tat|Arddhyata|yEna̍|karma̍ṇA|IrthsE̱t|tatra̍|hOtavyA̱ḥ|RuddhnOti̍|Eva|tEna̍|karma̍ṇA|yat|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|samaBa̍ranniti̍# saM - aBarann|tasmA̱t|aByAtAnA̍ ityaBi̍ - AtAnAḥ|vaiśvadEvA iti# vaiśva - dEvAḥ|yat|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|jayAn|prEti̍|aya̍cCat|tasmA̱t|jayA̱ḥ|prAjApatyA̍ iti# prAjA-patyAḥ|17 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA vai yadyajñE&kurvata̍ tadasurA̍ akurvata tE dEvA EtAnaByAtAnAna̍paśyan-̍ tAnaByAtanvata̍ yaddEvAnAM karmA&&*sIdArddhyata̍ tadyadasurAṇAM̍ na tadA̱rddhyata yEna karmaṇErthsEt tatra# hOtavyA# RuddhnOtyEva tEna karmaṇA̍ yadviśvE# dEvAḥ samaBaran̍ tasmA-daByAtAnA̍ vai̱śvadEvAyat-prajApatirjayAn̍ prAyacCat̍ tasmAjjayA̱ḥ prAjApatyA - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam yat|rAṣṭraBRudBiriti# rAṣṭraBRut - Biḥ|rAṣṭram|Eti|ada̍data|tat|rAṣṭraBRutAmiti̍# rAṣṭra - BRutA̱m|rAṣṭraBRuttvamiti# rAṣṭraBRut - tvam|tE|dEvAḥ|aByAtAnairityaBi̍ - AtAnaiḥ|asurAn|aByAta̍nvatEtya̍Bi̍ - Atanvata|jayai̱ḥ|ajayan|rAṣṭraBRudBiriti̍# rAṣṭraBRut - Biḥ|rAṣṭram|Eti|adadata|yat|dEvAḥ|aByAtAnairitya̍Bi̍ - AtAnaiḥ|asurAn|aByAta̍nvatEtya̍Bi̍ - Atanvata|tat|aByAtAnAnAmitya̍Bi̍ - AtAnAnA̱m|aByAtAnatvamityaByAtAna̍ - tvam|yat|jayai̱ḥ|ajayann|tat|jayA̍nAm|jayatvamiti̍# jaya - tvam|yat|rAṣṭraBRudBiriti# rAṣṭraBRut - Biḥ|rAṣṭram|Eti|ada̍data|tat|rAṣṭraBRutAmiti̍# rAṣṭra - BRutA̱m|rAṣṭraBRuttvamiti# rAṣṭraBRut - tvam|tataḥ|dEvAḥ|aBa̍vann|parEti̍|asu̍rAḥ|yaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyavAniti̍ BrAtRuvya̍ - vAn|syAt|saḥ ( )|EtAn|juhuyAt|aByAtAnairityaBi-AtAnaiḥ|Eva|BrAtRu̍vyAn|aByAta̍nuta̍ ityaBi̍ - AtanutE|jayai̱ḥ|jayati|rAṣṭraBRudBiriti̍# rAṣṭraBRut - Biḥ|rAṣṭram|Eti|dattE|Bava̍ti|AtmanA̱|parEti̍|asya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|Bavati||18̍ (68)
verses.samhita: yad-rA̱ṣṭraBRudBI# rAṣṭramA&dadata̍ tad-rA̱ṣṭraBRutAṃ# rAṣṭraBRuttvaM tE dEvA aByAtAnairasu̍rAnaByAta̍nvata̍ jayairajayan-rAṣṭraBRudBI̍# rAṣṭramA&dadata̍ yaddEvA aByAtAnairasu̍rAnaByAta̍nvata̍ tadaByAtAnAnA̍maByAtAnatvaM̍ ~Myajjayairajayan̍ tajjayAnAM̍ jayatvaM ~Myad-rA̱ṣṭraBRudBI# rAṣṭramA&dadata̍ tad-rA̱ṣṭraBRutAṃ# rAṣṭraBRuttvaM tatO# dEvA aBavan̍ parA&surA̍ yO BrAtRuvyavAnth̍ syAth sa ( ) EtAn juhuyAdaByAtAnairEva̍ BrAtRuvyAnaByAta̍nutE̍ jayai̱rjayati rAṣṭraBRudBI# rAṣṭramA dattE̍ BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱&sya BrAtRuvyO̍ Bavati||18

verses.padam: - Padam RutAṣAṭ|RutadhAmEtyRuta - dhAmA|agniḥ|gandharvaḥ|tasya|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|aPsarasa̍ḥ|Urja̍ḥ|nAma̍|saḥ|idam|brahma̍|kṣatram|pAtu|tAḥ|idam|brahma̍|kṣatram|pAntu|tasmai̱|svAhA̱|tABya̍ḥ|svAhA̱|saṃqhita̍ iti# saM - hitaḥ|viśvasAmEti# viśva - sAmA|sUryaḥ|gandharvaḥ|tasya̍|marI̍cayaḥ|aPsarasa̍ḥ|Ayuva̍ ityA̱ - yuvaḥ|suṣumna̍ iti# su - sumnaḥ|sUryaraśmiriti̍ sUrya-raśmiḥ|candramA̱ḥ|gandharvaḥ|tasya̍|nakṣa̍trAṇi|aPsarasa̍ḥ|bEkura̍yaḥ|Bujyuḥ|suparṇa̍ iti# su - parṇaḥ|yajñaḥ|gandharvaḥ|tasya|dakṣi̍ṇAḥ|aPsarasa̍ḥ|stavAḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|manaḥ|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: RutAṣAḍ RutadhAmA&gni-rga̍ndharvasta-syauṣa̍dhayO&Psarasa̍ UrjO nAma sa idaM brahma# kṣatraM pAtu̍ tA idaM brahma# kṣatraM pA̱ntu tasmai svAhA tAByaḥ svAhA# saṃhitO viśvasAmA̍ sUryO# gandharva-stasya marIcayO&Psarasa̍# Ayuvaḥ̍ suṣumnaḥ sUrya# raśmi-ścandramA# gandharva-stasya nakṣatrAṇya-PsarasO̍# bEkurayOBujyuḥ̍ suparṇO̍ yajñO gandharva-stasya̍ dakṣiṇA̍ apsarasa# stavAḥ prajApati-rviśvaka̍rmA̍ manO# - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam gandharvaḥ|tasya|RuKsAmAnItyRu̍k-sAmAni̍|aPsarasa̍ḥ|vahna̍yaḥ|iṣiraḥ|viśvavya̍cA̍ iti# viśva - vyacAḥ|vAtaḥ|gandharvaḥ|tasya̍|Apa̍ḥ|aPsarasa̍ḥ|mudAḥ|Buva̍nasya|patE|yasya̍|tE|upari̍|gRuhAḥ|iha|ca||saḥ|naḥ|rAsva|ajyA̍nim|rAyaḥ|pOṣa̱m|suvIryamiti̍# su - vIrya̱m|saM~MvathsarIṇAmiti# saM - vathsarIṇA̱m|svastim||paramEṣṭhI|adhipatirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|mRutyuḥ|gandharvaḥ|tasya|viśva̱m|aPsarasa̍ḥ|Buva̍ḥ|sukṣitiriti̍# su - kṣitiḥ|suBUtiriti̍ su - BUtiḥ|BadrakRuditi# Badra - kRut|suvarvAniti̍ suvaḥ̍ - vAn|parjanyaḥ|gandharvaḥ|tasya̍|vidyuta̍ iti# vi-dyutaḥ|aPsarasa̍ḥ|ruca̍ḥ|dUrEhE̍tiriti̍# dUrE - hEtiḥ|amRuḍayaḥ|20 (50)
verses.samhita: gandharvastasyarK̍ sAmAnya-PsarasO̍ vahnayaiṣirO̍ viśvavyacA̍ vAtO# gandharva-stasyA&&*pO̱ &PsarasO# mudABuvanasya̍ patE yasyata̍ upari# gRuhA iha ca|sa̍ nO# rAsvAjyAniṃ̍ rAyaspOṣaṃ# suvIryaṃ# saMva~MthsarIṇAṅ# svastiM||paramEṣṭhyadhipati-rmRutyur̍ gandharva-stasya̍ viśvamapsarasO̍ Buvaḥ̍ sukṣitiḥ- suBUti-rBadrakRuth̍ suvarvAn̍ parjanyO# gandharva-stasya# vidyutO̱ &PsarasO rucO# dUrE hEtira-mRuḍayO̍ - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam mRutyuḥ|gandharvaḥ|tasya|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|aPsarasaḥ|BIruva̍ḥ|cAru̍ḥ|kRupaṇakAśIti̍# kRupaṇa-kAśI|kAmaḥ|gandharvaḥ|tasya̍|Adhaya̍ ityA̱ - dhayaḥ|aPsarasa̍ḥ|śOcaya̍ntIḥ|nAma̍|saḥ|idam|brahma̍|kṣatram|pAtu|tAḥ|idam|brahma̍|kṣatram|pAntu|tasmai̱|svAhA̱|tABya̍ḥ|svAhA̱|saḥ|naḥ|Buvanasya|patE|yasya̍|tE|upari̍|gRuhAḥ|iha|ca||uru|brahma̍ṇE|asmai|kṣatrAya̍|mahi̍|śarma̍|yacCa||21̍ (46) (manO# - &mRuḍayaḥ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: mRutyurgandharva-stasya̍# prajA aPsarasO̍# BIruvaścaruḥ̍ kRupaṇa kAśI kAmO# gandharva-stasyAdhayO̱ &Psarasaḥ̍ śOcayantIrnAma̍ sa idaM brahma# kṣatraM pAta̍ tA idaM brahma# kṣatraM pA̱ntu tasmai svAhA tAByaḥ svAhA sa nO# Buvanasya patE yasyata̍ upari# gRuhA iha ca|uru̍ brahmaṇE&smai̍ kṣatrAya mahi śarma# yacCa||21 (manO# - &mRuḍayaḥ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam rAṣṭrakAmAyEti̍# rAṣṭra - kAmAya|hOtavyA̱ḥ|rAṣṭram|vai|rAṣṭraBRuta iti# rAṣṭra - BRutaḥ|rAṣṭrEṇa̍|Eva|asmai|rAṣṭram|avEti̍|rundhE|rAṣṭram|Eva|Bavati|AtmanE̱|hOtavyA̱ḥ|rAṣṭram|vai|rAṣṭraBRuta̍ iti# rAṣṭra - BRutaḥ|rAṣṭram|prajEti̍# pra - jA|rAṣṭram|paśavaḥ|rAṣṭram|yat|śrEṣṭha̍ḥ|Bava̍ti|rAṣṭrEṇa̍|Eva|rAṣṭram|avEti̍|rundhE|vasi̍ṣṭhaḥ|samAnAnA̱m|Bavati|grAma̍kAmAyEti̍ grAma# - kAmAya|hOtavyA̱ḥ|rAṣṭram|vai|rAṣṭraBRuta iti# rAṣṭra-BRutaḥ|rAṣṭram|sajAtA̍ iti# sa - jAtAḥ|rAṣṭrEṇa|Eva|asmai|rAṣṭram|sajAtAniti̍# sa - jAtAn|avEti|rundhE|grAmI|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rAṣṭrakAmAya̍ hOtavyA# rAṣṭraM ~Mvai rA̱ṣṭraBRutO# rAṣṭrEṇaivAsmai# rAṣṭramava# rundhE rAṣṭramEva BavatyAtmanE̍# hOtavyA# rAṣṭraM ~Mvai rA̱ṣṭraBRutO# rAṣṭraM prajA rAṣṭraM paśavO# rAṣṭraM ~MyacCrEṣṭhO Bavati̍ rAṣṭrEṇaiva rAṣṭramava# rundhE vasiṣṭhaḥ̍ samAnAnA̱M Bavati grAmakAmAya̍ hOtavyA# rAṣṭraM ~Mvai rA̱ṣṭraBRutO# rAṣṭraṃ sajAtA̍ rAṣṭrEṇaivAsmai# rAṣṭraṃ sajAtAnava̍# rundhE grAmyE# - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|Bavati|adhidEvana̍ ityadhi̍ - dEvanE|juhOti|adhidEva̍na̍ ityadhi̍ - dEvanE|Eva|asmai|sajAtAniti̍# sa-jAtAn|avEti|rundhE|tE|Enam|ava̍ruddhA̍ ityava# - ruddhAḥ|upEti|tiṣṭhantE|rathamuKa̍ iti# ratha - muKE|OjaskAmasyEtyOja̍ḥ̍ - kAmasya|hOtavyA̱ḥ|Ojaḥ|vai|rAṣṭraBRuta̍ iti# rAṣṭra-BRutaḥ|Oja̍ḥ|ratha̍ḥ|Oja̍sA|Eva|asmai|Oja̍ḥ|avEti̍|rundhE|OjasvI|Eva|Bavati|yaḥ|rAṣṭrAt|apa̍BUta̍ ityapa# - BUtaḥ|syAt|tasmai̱|hOtavyA̱ḥ|yAvantaḥ|asya|rathA̱ḥ|syuḥ|tAn|brUyAt|yu~gdhvam|iti̍|rAṣṭram|Eva|asmai|yunakti|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -va BavatyadhidEva̍nE̍ juhOtyadhidEvana̍ EvAsmai# sajAtAnava# rundhE ta Enamava̍ruddhA̍ upa# tiṣṭhantE rathamuKa OjaskAmasya̍ hOtavyA# OjO vai rA̱ṣṭraBRuta OjO ratha OjasaivAsmA̍ OjO&va# rundha OjasvyEva̍ Bavati̍ yO rAṣṭrAdapaBUtaḥ̍ syAt tasmai# hOtavyA# yAvantO&sya̍ rathAḥ syustAn brUyAd̍ yu~gdhvamiti# rAṣṭramEvAsmai# yunaktyA - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam Ahutaya̍ ityA - hutayaḥ|vai|Etasya|aklRu̍ptAḥ|yasya̍|rAṣṭram|na|kalpa̍tE|svarathasyEti̍# sva - rathasya|dakṣi̍ṇam|cakram|pravRuhyEti̍# pra - vRuhya|nAḍIm|aBIti̍|juhuyAt|Ahu̍tIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|Eva|asya|kalpayati|tAḥ|asya|kalpamAnAḥ|rAṣṭram|anviti̍|kalpatE|sagrAMqma̍ iti# saM - grAmE|saM~Myatta̍ iti saM - yattE|hOtavyA̱ḥ|rAṣṭram|vai|rAṣṭraBRuta iti# rAṣṭra - BRutaḥ|rAṣṭrE|Kalu̍|vai|EtE|vyAya̍cCanta̍ iti# vi - AyacCantE|yE|sagrAMqmamiti̍# saM - grAmam|saM~MyantIti# saM-yanti|yasya̍|pUrva̍sya|juhva̍ti|saḥ|Eva|Bavati|jaya̍ti|tam|sagrAMqmamiti̍# saM - grAmam|mAndhukaḥ|iddhmaḥ|24 (50)
verses.samhita: hutayO̍ vA EtasyAklRuptA̍ yasya# rAṣṭraM na kalpatE̍ svarathasya dakṣiṇaM̍ cakraM pravRuhya# nAḍImaBi juhuyAdAhu̍tIrEvAsya̍# kalpayati tA asya̍ kalpamAnA̍ rAṣṭramanu# kalpatE saMgrAmE saM~MyattE̍ hOtavyA# rAṣṭraM ~Mvai rA̱ṣṭraBRutO# rAṣṭrE Kalu vA EtE vyAyacCantE̍ yE sa~ggrAmaṃ̍ saM ~Myanti yasya pUrvasya̍ juhvati̍ sa Eva Bavati̍ jayati̍ taṃ sagrAMmaM̍ mA̱ndhuka iddhmO- [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|a~ggArAḥ|Eva|prativEṣṭa̍mAnA̍ iti# prati - vEṣṭamAnAḥ|amitrA̍ṇAm|asya|sEnA̱m|pratIti̍|vEṣṭayanti|yaḥ|unmAdyEdityu̍t̍ - mAdyE̱t|tasmai̱|hOtavyA̱ḥ|gandharvAPsarasa iti# gandharva - aPsarasaḥ|vai|Etam|uditi̍|mAdayanti|yaḥ|unmAdyatItyu̍t̍ - mAdyati|EtE|Kalu̍|vai|gandharvAPsarasa̍ iti# gandharva - aPsarasaḥ|yat|rAṣṭraBRuta̍ iti# rAṣṭra - BRutaḥ|tasmai̱|svAhA̱|tABya̍ḥ|svAhA̱|iti̍|juhOti|tEna̍|Eva|EnAn|śamayati|naiya̍grOdhaḥ|audu̍baMraḥ|Aśva̍tthaḥ|plAkṣa̍ḥ|iti̍|iddhmaḥ|Bavati|EtE|vai|gandharvAPsarasAmiti̍# gandharva - aPsarasA̱m|gRuhAḥ|svE|Eva|EnAn|25 (50)
verses.samhita: Bavatya~ggA̍rA̍ Eva prativEṣṭa̍mAnA̍ amitrAṇAmasya̍ sEnAM prativEṣṭayanti̍ ya unmAdyEt tasmai# hOtavyA# gandharvAPsarasO vA EtamunmAdayanti̍ ya unmAdyatyEtE̍ Kalu vai gandharvAPsarasO̍ yadrA̱ṣṭraBRutastasmai svAhA tAByaḥ svAhEti# juhOti tEnaivainA̱~jCamayati naiyagrOdha̍ audumbara̍ Aśvatthaḥ̍ plAkṣa itIddhmO BavatyEtE̍ vai gandharvAPsarasA̱M̍ gRuhAḥ sva EvainA# - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam Ayatana̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|śamayati|aBicaratEtya̍Bi̍ - caratA|pratilOmamiti̍# prati - lOmam|hOtavyA̱ḥ|prAṇAniti# pra - anAn|Eva|asya|pratIcaḥ|pratIti̍|yauti|tam|tata̍ḥ|yEna̍|kEna̍|ca|stRuṇutE|svakRu̍ta̍ iti sva - kRutE|iriṇE|juhOti|pradara̍ iti# pra - darE|vA|Etat|vai|asyai|niṛRutigRuhItamiti̍ niṛRuti̍ - gRuhItam|niṛRutigRuhIta̍ iti niṛRuti-gRuhItE|Eva|Enam|niṛRutyEti̍ niḥ-RutyA|grAhayati|yat|vAcaḥ|krUram|tEna|vaṣa̍ṭ|karOti|vAcaḥ|Eva|Enam|krUrEṇa̍|prEti̍|vRuścati|tAjak|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|yasya̍|kAmayE̍ta|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|26 (50)
verses.samhita: nAyatanE̍ śamayatyaBicaratA̍ pratilOmaṃ hOtavyA̱ḥ̍ prAṇAnEvAsya# pratIcaḥ prati# yauti taM tatO yEna kEna# ca stRuṇutE svakRuta̍ iriṇE̍ juhOti pradarE vaitadvA asyai niṛRutigRuhItaM̍ niṛRutigRuhIta̍ EvainaM niṛRutyA̍ grAhayati yadvAcaḥ krUraM tEna vaṣaṭ̍ karOti vAca EvainaM̍ krUrEṇa pravRuścati̍ tAjagArtimArcCati̍ yasya# kAmayEtAnnAdya̍ - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|dadIya|iti̍|tasya̍|saBAyA̱m|uttAna̍ ityut̍ - tAnaḥ|nipadyEti# ni - padya|Buva̍nasya|patE|iti̍|tRuṇA̍ni|samiti̍|gRuhṇIyAt|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vai|Buvanasya|pati̍ḥ|prajApa̍tinEti̍# prajA - patinA|Eva|asya|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|Eti|dattE|idam|aham|amuṣya̍|AmuṣyAyaṇasya̍|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|harAmi|iti|Aha|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|Eva|asya|harati|ṣaḍBiriti# ṣaṭ - Biḥ|harati|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|prajApa̍tinEti̍# prajA-patinA|Eva|asya|annAdyamityanna̍ -adya̱m|AdAyEtyA̱-dAya|Rutava̍ḥ|asmai|anu̍|prEti̍|yacCanti|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mA dadIyEti̍ tasya# saBAyAmuttAnO̍ nipadya Buvanasya̍ pata iti tRuṇAni̍ saM gRuhṇIyAt̍ prajApatirvai̍ Buvanasya̍ patiḥ̍ prajApatinaivAsyAnnAdyamA̍ datta̍ idamahamamuṣyA# &&*muṣyAyaṇasyAnnAdyaṃ# harAmItyAhAnnAdya̍mEvAsya̍# harati ṣaḍBiṛharati̍ ṣaḍvA Rutavaḥ̍ prajApatinaivAsyA-nnAdya̍mAdAyartavO̱̍ &smA anu prayacCanti̍ - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|jyEṣṭhabandhuriti̍# jyEṣṭha - bandhuḥ|apaBUta̍ ityapa# - BUtaḥ|syAt|tam|sthalE̱|avasAyyEtyava̍ - sAyya|brahmaudanamiti̍# brahma - Odanam|catuḥ̍ śarAvamiti catuḥ̍ - śarAvam|paktvA|tasmai̱|hOtavyA̱ḥ|varṣma|vai|rAṣṭraBRuta̍ iti# rAṣṭra - BRutaḥ|varṣma̍|sthala̱m|varṣma̍ṇA|Eva|Enam|varṣma̍|samAnAnA̱m|gamayati|catu̍ḥ̍ śarAva iti catuḥ̍ - śarAvaḥ|Bavati|dikṣu|Eva|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|kṣIrE|Bavati|ruca̱m|Eva|asminn|dadhAti|uditi̍|harati|śRutatvAyEti̍# śRuta - tvAya|sarpiṣvAn̍|Bavati|mEddhyatvAyEti̍# mEddhya-tvAya|catvAra̍ḥ|Arq.ṣEyAḥ|prEti̍|aśnanti|diśAm|Eva|jyOti̍ṣi|juhOti||28̍ (49)
verses.samhita: yO jyEṣṭhabandhurapa̍# BUtaḥ syAt taṅsthalE&vasAyya̍# brahmaudanaM catuḥ̍ śarAvaM paktvA tasmai# hOtavyA# varṣma vai rA̱ṣṭraBRutO vaṣma sthalaM ~MvarṣmaṇaivainaM̍ ~Mvaṣma# samAnAnA̱M gamayati catuḥ̍ śarAvO Bavati dikṣvEva̍ pratitiṣṭhati̍ kṣIrE Bavati̍ rucamEvAsmi̍n̍ dadhAtyuddharati̍ śRutatvAya# sarpiṣvA̱n Bavati mEddhyatvAya# catvAra# AṛṣEyAḥ prAśnanti̍ diśAmEva jyOtiṣi̍ juhOti||28

verses.padam: - Padam dEvikAḥ|niriti̍|vapEt|prajAkA̍ma̍ iti# prajA - kAmaḥ|CandAṃsi|vai|dEvi̍kAḥ|CandAṃ̍si|iva|Kalu̍|vai|prajA̍ iti# pra-jAḥ|CandOBiriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|asmai|prajA iti# pra-jAḥ|prEti|janayati|prathamam|dhAtAra̱m|karOti|mithunI|Eva|tEna̍|karOti|anviti̍|Eva|asmai|anu̍matiritya̍nu̍ - matiḥ|manyatE|rAtE|rAkA|prEti|sinIvAlI|janayati|prajAsviti̍# pra - jAsu|Eva|prajA̍tAsviti̍ pra - jAtAsu|kuhvA̱|vAca̱m|dadhAti|EtAḥ|Eva|niriti|vapEt|paśukA̍ma̍ iti# paśu - kAmaḥ|CandAṃsi|vai|dEvi̍kAḥ|CandAṃ̍si|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvikA̍ nivarpEt̍ prajAkAmaśCandAṃ̍si̍ vai dEvikAśCandAṃ̍sIva̍ Kalu vai prajAśCandOBirEvAsmai̱̍ prajAḥ prajanayati̍ prathamaM dhAtAraM̍ karOti mithunI Eva tEna# karOtyanvEvAsmA anumatirmanyatE̍ rAtE rAkA pra sinIvAlI̍ janayati̍ prajAsvEva prajAtAsu̍ kuhvA# vAcaM̍ dadhAtyEtA Eva nivarpEt̍ paśukAmaśCandAṃ̍si̍ vai dEvikAśCandAṃ̍sI̍ - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam iva|Kalu|vai|paśava̍ḥ|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|asmai|paśUn|prEti|janayati|prathamam|dhAtAra̱m|karOti|prEti̍|Eva|tEna̍|vApayati|anviti̍|Eva|asmai|anu̍matiritya̍nu̍ - matiḥ|manyatE|rAtE|rAkA|prEti|sinIvAlI|janayati|paśUn|Eva|prajA̍tAniti̍ pra-jAtAn|kuhvA̱|pratIti|sthApayati|EtAḥ|Eva|niriti̍|vapEt|grAma̍kAma̍ iti grAma# - kAmaḥ|CandAṃsi|vai|dEvi̍kAḥ|CandAṃ̍si|iva|Kalu̍|vai|grAma̍ḥ|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|asmai|grAma̱m|30 (50)
verses.samhita: va Kalu vai paśavaśCandOBirEvAsmai̍# paśUn prajanayati̍ prathamaM dhAtAraM̍ karOti praiva tEna# vApayatyanvEvAsmA anumatirmanyatE̍ rAtE rAkA pra sinIvAlI̍ janayati̍ paśUnEva prajAtAn̍ kuhvA̱ pratiṣṭhApayatyEtA̍ Eva nirvapEd-grAma̍kAmaśCandAṃ̍si̍ vai dEvikAśCandAṃ̍sI̍ va Kalu vai grAmaśCandOBirEvAsmai̍ grAma - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam avEti|rundhE|maddhyataḥ|dhAtAra̱m|karOti|maddhyataḥ|Eva|Enam|grAma̍sya|dadhAti|EtAḥ|Eva|niriti̍|vapEt|jyOgA̍mayAvIti̍ jyOk - AmayAvI|CandAṃsi|vai|dEvi̍kAḥ|CandAṃ̍si|Kalu̍|vai|Etam|aBIti̍|manyantE|yasya̍|jyOk|Amaya̍ti|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|Enam|agadam|karOti|maddhyataḥ|dhAtAra̱m|karOti|maddhyataḥ|vai|Etasya|aklRu̍ptam|yasya̍|jyOk|Amaya̍ti|maddhyataḥ|Eva|asya|tEna̍|kalpayati|EtAḥ|Eva|niriti̍|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mava# rundhE maddhyatO dhAtAraM̍ karOti maddhyata EvainaM grAmasya̍ dadhAtyEtA Eva nirvapEjjyOgA̍mayAvI̍ CandAṃsi̍ vai dEvikAśCandAṃ̍si̍ Kalu vA EtamaBi manyantE̍ yasya jyOgAmayati̍ CandOBirEvaina̍-magadaM̍ karOti̍ maddhyatO dhAtAraM̍ karOti maddhyatO vA EtasyAklRuptaM̍ ~Myasya jyOgAmayati̍ maddhyata EvAsya tEna# kalpayatyEtA Eva ni - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam vapEt|yam|yajñaḥ|na|upanamEdityupa̍ - namE̱t|CandAṃsi|vai|dEvi̍kAḥ|CandAṃ̍si|Kalu̍|vai|Etam|na|upEti̍|namanti|yam|yajñaḥ|na|upanamatItyu̍pa̍ - namati|prathamam|dhAtAra̱m|karOti|muKataḥ|Eva|asmai|CandAṃ̍si|dadhAti|upEti̍|Enam|yajñaḥ|namati|EtAḥ|Eva|niriti̍|vapEt|IjAnaḥ|CandAṃ̍si|vai|dEvi̍kAḥ|yAtayA̍mAnIti̍# yAta - yAmAni|iva|Kalu|vai|Etasya̍|CandAṃ̍si|yaḥ|IjAnaḥ|uttamamityu̍t̍ - tamam|dhAtAra̱m|karOti|32 (50)
verses.samhita: rvapEdyaM̍ ~MyajñO nOpanamEcCandAṃsi̍ vai dEvikAśCandAṃ̍si̍ Kalu vA EtaM nOpa# namanti yaM ~MyajñO nOpanamati̍ prathamaM dhAtAraM̍ karOti muKata EvAsmai CandAṃsi̍ dadhAtyupainaM̍ ~MyajñO namatyEtA̍ Eva nivarpEdIjAnaśCandAṃ̍si̍ vai dEvikA̍ yAtayAmAnIva̍ Kalu vA Etasya CandAṃsi̍ ya IjAna̍ uttamaM̍ dhAtAraM̍ karO - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam upariṣṭAt|Eva|asmai|CandAṃ̍si|ayA̍tayAmAnItyayA̍ta̍ - yAmAni|avEti|rundhE|upEti̍|Enam|utta̍ra̍ ityut - taraḥ|yajñaḥ|namati|EtAḥ|Eva|niriti|vapEt|yam|mEdhA|na|upanamEdityu̍pa̍ - namE̱t|CandAṃsi|vai|dEvi̍kAḥ|CandAṃ̍si|Kalu̍|vai|Etam|na|upEti̍|namanti|yam|mEdhA|na|upanamatItyu̍pa̍ - namati|prathamam|dhAtAra̱m|karOti|muKataḥ|Eva|asmai|CandAṃ̍si|dadhAti|upEti̍|Enam|mEdhA|namati|EtAḥ|Eva|niriti̍|vapEt|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tyupariṣṭAdEvAsmai̍ CandAṅqsyayAtayAmAnyava̍# rundha upainamutta̍rO̍ yajñO namatyEtA̍ Eva nivarpEdyaM̍ mEdhA nOpanamEcCandAṃsi̍ vai dEvikAśCandAṃ̍si̍ Kalu vA EtaM nOpa# namanti yaM mEdhA nOpanamati̍ prathamaM dhAtAraM̍ karOti muKata EvAsmai CandAṃsi̍ dadhAtyupainaM̍ mEdhA namatyEtA̍ Eva nivarpE̍ - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam rukkAma̍ iti ruk-kAmaḥ|CandAṃsi|vai|dEvi̍kAḥ|CandAṃ̍si|iva|Kalu̍|vai|ruk|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ-Biḥ|Eva|asminn|ruca̱m|dadhAti|kṣIrE|Bavanti|ruca̱m|Eva|asminn|dadhati|maddhyataḥ|dhAtAra̱m|karOti|maddhyataḥ|Eva|Enam|rucaḥ|dadhAti|gAyatrI|vai|anu̍matiritya̍nu̍ - matiḥ|triṣṭuk|rAkA|jagatI|sinIvAlI|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|kuhUḥ|dhAtA|vaṣaṭkAra iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|pUrvapakṣa iti# pUrva - pakṣaḥ|rAkA|aparapakṣa ityapara̍ - pakṣaḥ|kuhUḥ|amAvAsyEtyamA̍ - vAsyA̱|sinIvAlI|paurṇamAsIti# paurṇa - mAsI|anumatiritya̍nu̍ - matiḥ|candramA̱ḥ|dhAtA|aṣṭau|34 (50)
verses.samhita: drukkAmaśCandAṃ̍si̍ vai dEvikAśCandAṃ̍sIva̍ Kalu vai ruk CandOBirEvAsmin̍ rucaM̍ dadhAtikṣIrE Bavanti̍ rucamEvAsmi̍n̍ dadhati maddhyatO dhAtAraM̍ karOti maddhyata Evainaṃ# rucO dadhAtigAyatrI̍ vA anumatistriṣṭugrAkA̍ jagatI̍ sinIvAlyanuṣṭup̍ kuhUrddhAtA vaṣaṭkAraḥ̍ pU̱rvapakṣO rAkA&parapakṣaḥ̍ kuhUramAvAsyA̍# sinIvAlI pau̱rṇamAsyanumatiścandramA̍# dhAtA&ṣṭau - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam vasavaḥ|aṣṭAkṣarEtyaṣṭA̍ - akṣarA|gAyatrI|EkAdaśa|rudrAḥ|EkA̍daśAkṣarEtyEkA̍daśa̍ - akṣarA|triṣṭup|dvAdaśa|AdityAḥ|dvAda̍śAkṣarEti̍ dvAdaśa-akṣarA|jaga̍tI|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|anuṣṭubityanu-stup|dhAtA|vaṣaṭkAra̍ iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|Etat|vai|dEvikAḥ|sarvA̍ṇi|ca|CandAṃ̍si|sarvA̱ḥ|ca|dEvatA̱ḥ|vaṣaṭkAra̍ iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|tAḥ|yat|saha|sarvA̱ḥ|nirvapEditi# niḥ - vapE̱t|IśvarAḥ|Enam|pradaha iti# pra - dahaḥ|dvE̍ iti|prathamE̍ iti|nirupyEti̍# niḥ - upya|dhAtuḥ|tRutIya̱m|niriti̍|vapEt|tathO̍ iti|Eva|utta̍rE̍ ityut - tarE|niriti|vapEt|tathA̱|Enam|na|prEti̍|dahanti̍ ( )|athO iti|yasmai̱|kAmA̍ya|nirupyanta̍ iti# niḥ - upyantE̱|tam|Eva|ABiḥ|upEti|ApnOti||35̍ (59) (paśukAmaśCandAṃ̍si̍ vai dEvikAśCandAṃ̍si-grAma̍M-kalpayatyEtA̍ Eva ni-ruttamandhAtAra̍M̍ karOti - mEdhA namatyEtA̍ Eva nirvapE̍ - daṣṭau - dahanti̍ - nava# ca) (A9)
verses.samhita: vasavO&ṣṭAkṣa̍rA̍ gAyatryEkAdaśa̍ rudrA EkAdaśAkṣarA̍ triṣṭub dvAdaśA&&*dityA̍ dvAdaśAkṣarA̍ jagatI̍ prajApatiranuṣṭub̍ dhAtA vaṣaṭkAra̍ Etadvai dEvikAḥ̍ sarvAṇi̍ ca CandAṃsi̍ sarvA̱śca dEvatA# vaṣaṭkArastA yath saha sarvA# nirvapEdIśvarA̍ EnaM̍ pradahO dvE prathamE̍ nirupya# dhAtustRutIyaM nivarpEt̍ tathO# EvOttarE̍ nivarpEt̍ tathainaM̍ na pradahantya̍ ( ) thO yasmai kAmAya̍ nirupyantE tamEvA&&*BirupA̱&&*pnOti||35 (paśukAmaśCandAṃ̍si̍ vai dEvikAśCandAṃ̍si-grAma̍M-kalpayatyEtA̍ Eva ni-ruttamandhAtAra̍M̍ karOti - mEdhA namatyEtA̍ Eva nirvapE̍ - daṣṭau - dahanti̍ - nava# ca) (A9) śpEcial KOrvai:-

verses.padam: - Padam vAstO̱ḥ|patE|pratIti|jAnIhi|asmAn|svAvEśa̍ iti# su-AvEśaḥ|anamIvaḥ|Bava|naḥ||yat|tvA|ImahE|pratIti̍|tat|naḥ|juṣasva|śam|naḥ|Edhi|dvipada̍ iti# dvi - padE̱|śam|catuṣpada̍ iti catuḥ̍ - padE||vAstO̱ḥ|patE|śagmayA̱|saṃqsadEti# saM - sadA̱|tE|sakṣImahi|raṇvayA̱|gAtumatyEti̍# gAtu - matyA̱||Avaḥ|kṣEmE̱|uta|yOgE̱|vara̱m|naḥ|yUyam|pAta|svastiBiriti̍# svasti - Biḥ|sadA̱|naḥ||yat|sAyaMprAtariti̍# sAyaM - prAtaḥ|agnihOtramityagni̍ - hOtram|juhOti|AhutIṣṭakA̍ ityAhuti̍ - iṣṭakAḥ|Eva|tAḥ|upEti|dhattE|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAstO̱ṣpatE prati# jAnI hyasmAnth svAvEśO̍ anamIvO̍ BavAnaḥ|yat̍ tvEmahE̍ pratitannO# juṣasva śanna# Edhi dvipadE śa~jcatuṣpadE||vAstO̱ṣpatE̍ śagmayA# saṃq sadAtE̍ sakṣImahi# raṇvayA# gAtumatyA̱|Avaḥ kṣEma# uta yOgE varannO̍ yUyaM pAta̍ svastiBiḥ sadAnaḥ||yath̍ sAyaM prAtaragnihOtraM̍ juhOtyAhutIṣṭakA̍ Eva tA upa# dhattE - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam yajamAnaḥ|ahOrAtrAṇItya̍haḥ-rAtrAṇi̍|vai|Etasya̍|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|yaḥ|Ahi̍tAgnirityAhi̍ta̍ - agniḥ|yat|sAyaMprAtariti̍# sAyaM-prAtaḥ|juhOti|ahOrAtrAṇItya̍haḥ̍ - rAtrAṇi|Eva|AptvA|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|kRutvA|upEti̍|dhattE|daśa̍|samAnatra̍|juhOti|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|Eva|AptvA|iṣṭakAm|kRutvA|upEti̍|dhattE|athO̍ iti|virAjIti̍# vi - rAji|Eva|yajñam|ApnOti|citya̍ścitya̍ iti cityaḥ̍ - cityaḥ|asya|Bavati|tasmA̱t|yatra|daśa̍|uṣitvA|prayAtIti̍# pra - yAti|tat|yajñavAstviti̍# yajña-vAstu|avA̱stu|Eva|tat|yat|tataḥ|arvAcIna̱m|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajamAnO&hOrAtrAṇi̍ vA EtasyEṣṭakA̍ ya AhitAgniryath̍ sAyaM prAtarjuhOtya̍hOrAtrAṇyEvA̍ &&*ptvEṣṭakAḥ̍ kRutvOpa# dhattE daśa# samAnatra# juhOti daśA̱kṣarA virAḍ virAjamEvA&&*ptvEṣṭa̍kAM̍ kRutvOpa# dhattE&thO# virAjyEva yajñamA̱pnOti cityaścityO&sya̍ Bavati tasmAdyatra daśOṣitvA̍ prayAti tad-yajñavAstvavA̱stvEva̍ tadyat tatO̱&rvAcInaṃ# - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam rudraḥ|Kalu|vai|vAstOṣpatiriti̍# vAstOḥ-patiḥ|yat|ahutvA|vAstOṣpatIyamiti̍# vAstOḥ - patIya̱m|prayAyAditi# pra - yAyAt|rudraḥ|Enam|BUtvA|agniḥ|anUtthAyEtyanu̍ - utthAya|hanyAt|vAstOṣpatIyamiti̍# vAstOḥ - patIya̱m|juhOti|BAgadhEyEnEti# BAga - dhEyEna|Eva|Enam|śamayati|na|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|yaja̍mAnaḥ|yat|yuktE|juhuyAt|yathA̱|prayA̍ta̍ iti pra - yAtE|vAstau̱|AhutimityA-hutim|juhOti̍|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|yat|ayu̍ktE|juhuyAt|yathA̱|kṣEmE̱|Ahu̍timityA̍ - hutim|juhOti|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|ahu̍tam|asya|vAstOṣpatIyamiti̍# vAstOḥ - patIya̱m|syAt|38 (50)
verses.samhita: rudraḥ Kalu vai vA̱stOṣpatiryadahutvA̍ vAstOṣpatIyaM̍ prayAyAd rudra EnaM̍ BUtvA&gniranUtthAya̍# hanyAdvAstOṣpatIyaM̍ juhOti BAgadhEyEnaivainaṃ̍# śamayati nA&&*rtimArcCati̍ yajamAnO̍ yadyuktE juhuyAdyathA̍ prayAtE̍ vAstAvAhutiM̍ juhOti# tAdRugEva tadyadayuktE̍ juhuyAdyathA kṣEma AhutiM̍ juhOti# tAdRugEva tadahutamasya̍ vAstOṣpatIyaṅ# syA - [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam dakṣiṇaḥ|yuktaḥ|Bava̍ti|savyaḥ|ayu̍ktaḥ|atha̍|vAstOṣpatIyamiti̍# vAstOḥ -patIya̱m|juhOti|uBaya̱m|Eva|akaḥ|aparivargamityapa̍ri̍ - vargam|Eva|Enam|śamayati|yat|EkayA|juhuyAt|darvihOmamiti̍# darvi - hOmam|kuryAt|purOnuvAkyAmiti̍# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱m|anUcyEtyanu̍ - ucya|yAjya̍yA|juhOti|sadEvatvAyEti̍# sadEva - tvAya|yat|hutE|AdaddhyAdityA̱̍ - daddhyAt|rudram|gRuhAn|anvArOhayEditya̍nu̍ - ArOhayEt|yat|avakṣAṇAnItya̍va̍ - kṣAṇAni|asa̍praMkṣApyEtyasa̱M̍ - prakṣApya|prayAyAditi# pra - yAyAt|yathA̱|yajñavEśasamiti# yajña - vEśasam|vA|AdahanamityA̱̍ - dahanam|vA|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|ayam|tE|yOni̍ḥ|Rutviya̍ḥ|iti̍|araṇyO̱ḥ|samArO̍hayatIti̍# saM - ArOhayati|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ddakṣiṇO̍ yuktO Bavati̍ savyO&yuktO&tha# vAstOṣpatIyaM̍ juhOtyuBayamEvA&̍ karaparivargamEvainaṃ̍# śamayati yadEkayA̍ juhuyAddarvihOmaM̍ kuryAt̍ purO&nuvAkyA# manUcya# yAjyayA̍ juhOti sadEvatvAya yaddhuta AdaddhyAd̍ rudraM gRuhAnanvArOhayEd-yada̍vakṣAṇAnyasa̍M̍ prakṣApya prayAyAdyathA# yajñavEśasaM ~MvA&&dahanaM̍ ~MvA tAdRugEva tadayantE yOniṛRutviya̍ ityaraṇyO̱ḥ samArOhaya̍ - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam Eṣaḥ|vai|agnEḥ|yOniḥ|svE|Eva|Enam|yOnau̱|samArO̍hayatIti̍# saM-ArOhayati|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|yat|araṇyO̱ḥ|samArU̍ḍha̍ iti# saM-ArUḍhaḥ|naśyE̱t|uditi̍|asya|agniḥ|sIdEt|punarAdhEya̍ iti# punaḥ - AdhEyaḥ|syAt|iti̍|yA|tE|agna|yajñiyA̱|tanUḥ|tayA̱|Eti̍|ihi|Eti̍|rOha|iti̍|Atmann|samArO̍hayata̍ iti# saM-ArOhayatE|yaja̍mAnaḥ|vai|agnEḥ|yOni̍ḥ|svAyA̱m|Eva|Enam|yOnyA̱m|samArO̍hayata̍ iti# saM - ArOhayatE||40̍ (45) (dhattE- &rvAcInaṅ# -syAth-samArOhayati̍ -pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: -tyEṣa vA agnEryOniḥ sva EvainaM ~MyOnau# samArOhayatyathO̍ KalvAhuryadaraṇyO̱ḥ̍ samArUḍhO̍ naśyEdudasyAgniḥ̍ sIdEt̍ punarAdhEyaḥ̍ syAditi yA tE# agnE yajñiyA# tanUstayEhyA rOhEtyAtmanth samArOhayatE̍ yajamAnO̍ vA agnEryOniḥ svAyAmEvainaM̍ ~MyOnyAṃ# samArOhayatE||40̍ (dhattE-&rvAcInaṅ# -syAth-samArOhayati̍ -pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam tvam|agnE|bRuhat|vayaḥ|dadhA̍si|dEva|dAśuṣE̱||kaviḥ|gRuhapa̍tiriti̍# gRuha - patiḥ|yuvA̱||havyavAḍiti# havya - vAṭ|agniḥ|ajaraḥ|pitA|naḥ|viBuriti̍# vi - Buḥ|viBAvEti# vi - BAvA̱|sudRuśIka̍ iti# su - dRuśIkaḥ|asmE̍ iti||sugArqḥapatyA̍ iti# su - gArqḥapatyAḥ|samiti|iṣa̍ḥ|didIhi|qsmadriyagitya̍sma̍ - driyak|samiti̍|mimIhi|śravAṃ̍si||tvam|ca|sOma|naḥ|vaśa̍ḥ|jIvAtu̱m|na|marAmahE||priyastO̱tra̍ iti# priya - stOtraḥ|vanaspatiḥ||brahmA|dEvAnA̱m|padavIriti̍# pada - vIḥ|kavInAm|Ruṣiḥ|viprA̍ṇAm|mahiṣaḥ|mRugAṇA̱m||śyEnaḥ|gRuddhrA̍ṇAm|svadhi̍tiriti̍ sva - dhitiḥ|vanAnAm|sOma̍ḥ|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tvamagnE̍ bRuhadvayO dadhAsi̍ dEva dAśuṣE̱|kavirgRuhapatiryuvA̱||havyavAḍagnirajara̍ḥ̍ pitA nO# viBurviBAvA# sudRuśIkO̍ asmE|sugArqḥapatyAḥ samiṣO# didIhyasmadriyaKsaM mimIhi̍ śravAṃsi||tvaM̍ ca# sOma nO vaśO# jIvAtuM na marAmahE|priyastO̱trO̍ vanaspatiḥ||brahmA̍ dEvAnA̱M padavIḥ kavInAmRuṣirviprA̍ṇAM̍ mahiṣO mRugAṇA̱M|śyEnO gRuddhrAṇAṅq̍ svadhiti̍ rvanAnAṃq̍ sOmaḥ̍ - [ ] 41

verses.padam: - Padam pavitra̱m|atIti|Eti|rEBann̍||Eti̍|viśvadE̍vamiti̍# viśva - dEvam|satpatimiti̍ sat - patim|sUktairiti# su-uktaiḥ|adya|vRuṇImahE||satyasavamiti̍# satya-savam|savitAra̱m||Eti|satyEna̍|raja̍sA|varta̍mAnaḥ|nivEśayanniti̍# ni-vEśayann|amRuta̱m|martya̱m|ca||hiraṇyayE̍na|savitA|rathE̍na|Eti̍|dEvaḥ|yAti|Buva̍nA|vipaśyanniti̍# vi-paśyann||yathA̱|naḥ|adi̍tiḥ|kara̍t|paśvE̱|nRuBya̍ iti nRu - Byaḥ|yathA̱|gavE̱||yathA̱|tOkAya|rudriya̱m||mA|naḥ|tOkE|tana̍yE|mA|naḥ|Ayu̍ṣi|mA|naḥ|gOṣu̍|mA|42̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pavitramatyEti̍ rEBann||A̍ viśvadEvaṃq̍ satpatiṃ̍ sUktairadyA vRuṇImahE|satyasa̍vaṃ̍ savitAra̱M||AsatyEna rajasA̍ vartamAnO̍ nivEśayannamRutaM̍ martya~jca|hiraṇyayE̍na̍ savitA rathEnA&&* dEvOyAti̍ BuvanA̍ vipaśyann||yathA̍# nO aditiḥ̍ karat paśvE nRuByO yathA gavE̱|yathA# tOkAya# rudriya̱M||mA nastOkE̍ tanayE̍ mA na Ayuṣi̍ mA nO gOṣu mA- [ ] 42

verses.padam: - Padam naḥ|aśvEṣu|rIriṣaḥ||vIrAn|mA|naḥ|rudra|BAmitaḥ|vadhIḥ|haviṣma̍ntaḥ|nama̍sA|vidhEma|tE||udapruta̍ ityuda̍ - prutaḥ|na|vaya̍ḥ|rakṣa̍mAṇAḥ|vAva̍dataḥ|aBriya̍sya|iva|GOṣA̱ḥ||giriBraja̍ iti# giri - Brajaḥ|na|Urmaya̍ḥ|mada̍ntaḥ|bRuhaspati̱m|aBIti̍|arkAḥ|anAvann||haṃqsaiḥ|iva|saKi̍Biriti̍ saKi# - Biḥ|vAvadadBiriti̍ vAvadat-̍ Biḥ|aśmanmayAnItyaśmann̍ - mayAni|naha̍nA|vyasyanniti̍# vi-asyann||bRuhaspati̍ḥ|aBikani̍kradaditya̍Bi̍ - kanikradat|gAḥ|uta|prEti̍|astaut|uditi̍|ca|vidvAn|agAyat||Eti̍|indra|sAnasim|rayim|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: nO aśvEṣu̍ rIriṣaḥ|vIrAn mAnO# rudra BAmitO vadhIṛhaviṣma̍ntO̍ namasA̍ vidhEma tE||udaprutO na vayO rakṣamAṇA̍ vAvadatO̍ aBriyasyEva̍ GOṣA̱ḥ|giriBrajO nOrmayO madantO̍ bRuhaspatimaBya̍rkA̍ anAvann||haṃqsairi̍va̍ saKiBirvAva̍dadBiraśman-̍ mayAni̍ nahanA̍ vyasyann|bRuhaspati̍raBikani̍kradadgA̍ uta prAstauducca# vidvAṃ agAyat||Endra̍# sAnasiṃ rayiṃ - [ ] 43

verses.padam: - Padam sajitvAnamiti̍# sa - jitvAnam|sadAsahamiti̍# sadA - saha̱m||vaṛṣiṣṭham|UtayE̱|Bara||prEti̍|sasAhiṣE|puruhUtEti̍# puru-hUta|śatrUn|jyEṣṭha̍ḥ|tE|śuṣma̍ḥ|iha|rAtiḥ|astu||indra̍|Eti̍|Bara|dakṣi̍ṇEna|vasU̍ni|pati̍ḥ|sindhU̍nAm|asi|rEvatI̍nAm||tvam|sutasya̍|pItayE̱|sadyaḥ|vRuddhaḥ|ajAyathAḥ|indra̍|jyaiṣṭhyA̍ya|sukratO̍ iti# su-kratO||Buvaḥ|tvam|indra|brahma̍ṇA|mahAn|Buva̍ḥ|viśvE̍ṣu|sava̍nEṣu|yajñiya̍ḥ||Buva̍ḥ|nRUn|cyautnaḥ|viśva̍sminn|BarE̱|jyEṣṭha̍ḥ|ca|mantra̍ḥ|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sajitvAnaṃ̍ sadAsaha̱M|vaṛṣiṣṭhamUtayE̍# Bara||pra sasAhiṣE̍ puruhUta śatrUn jyEṣṭhastE̍ śuṣma# iha rAtirastu|indrA&&*̍ Bara̍ dakṣiṇEnA̍ vasUni̍ patiḥ sindhUnAmasi̍ rEvatInAM||tvaṃ̍ sutasya# pItayE# sadyO vRuddhO ajAyathAḥ|indra̍ jyaiṣṭhyAya̍ sukratO||Buvastvamindra̍ brahmaṇA̍ mahAn BuvO viśvEṣu̍ savanEṣu̍ yajñiyaḥ|BuvO̍ nRUṅścyautnO viśvasmin̍ BarE jyEṣṭhaśca̍ mantrO# - [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam viśvacarq.ṣaṇa iti# viśva - carq.ṣaṇE||mitrasya|carq.ṣaṇIdhRuta̍ iti# caṛṣaṇI - dhRutaḥ|śrava̍ḥ|dEvasya̍|sAnasim||satyam|citraśra̍vastamamiti̍# citraśravaḥ̍ - tamam||mitraḥ|janAn|yAtayati|prajAnanniti̍# pra - jAnan|mitraḥ|dAdhAra|pRuthivIm|uta|dyAm||mitraḥ|kRuṣṭIḥ|animiṣEtyani̍# - miṣA|aBIti|caṣṭE|satyAya̍|havyam|GRutavaditi̍# GRuta-vat|vidhEma||prEti|saḥ|mitra|marta̍ḥ|astu|praya̍svAn|yaḥ|tE|Aditya|śikṣa̍ti|vratEna̍||na|hanyatE|na|jIyatE|tvOta̍ḥ|na|Enam|aṃha̍ḥ|aśnOti|anti̍taḥ|na|dUrAt||yat|45̍ (50)
verses.samhita: viśvacaṛṣaṇE||mitrasya# caṛṣaṇIdhRutaḥ śravO# dEvasya# sAnasiM|satyaM citra śravastamaM||mitrO̍ janAn# yAtayati prajAnan mitrO dAdhAra̍ pRuthivImuta dyAM|mitraḥ kRuṣṭIranimiṣA&Bi̍ caṣṭE̍ satyAya# havyaM GRutavad-vidhEma||prasami̍tra̍ martO# astu prayasvAnq.̍ yasta# Aditya śikṣati̍ vratEna|na̍ hanyatE̍ na jIyatE̍ tvOtO nainamaṃhO# aśnOtyantitO̍ na dUrAt||ya- [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam cit|hi|tE|viśaḥ|yathA|prEti̍|dEva|varuṇa|vratam||minImasi̍|dyavi̍dyavIti̍ dyavi# - dyavi||yat|kim|ca|idam|varuṇa|daivyE̱|janE̱|aBidrOhamityaBi̍ - drOham|manuṣyA̱ḥ|carAmasi||aci̍ttI|yat|tava̍|dharmA̱|yuyOpima|mA|naḥ|tasmA̱t|Ena̍saḥ|dEva|rIriṣaḥ||kitavAsa̍ḥ|yat|riripuḥ|na|dIvi|yat|vA|Ga|satyam|uta|yat|na|vidma||sarvA̱|tA|vIti̍|sya|śithirA̍ ( )|iva|dEva|atha|tE|syAma|varuṇa|priyAsa̍ḥ||46̍ (57) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- (vi vA EtasyA - &&vAyO̍ - imE vai - citta~jcA - &gnirBUtAnA̱M - dEvA vA aByAtAnA̍ - nRutAṣAḍ̍ - rAṣṭrakAmAya̍ - dEvikA̍ - vAstO̱ṣpatE - tvamagnE̍ bRuha - dEkAdaśa̍ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (vi vA EtasyE - tyAha̍ - mRutyurgandharvO̍ - &va# rundhE maddhyata - stvamagnE̍ bRuhath - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśat)̍ First and Last Padam of Fourth Prasnam of Kandam 3 :- (vi vA Etasya# - priyAsaḥ̍ )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE tRutIyakAṇḍE caturthaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||
verses.samhita: cciddhi tE viśO# yathA pradEva̍ varuṇa vrataM|minImasi dyavidyavi||yat̍ ki~jcEdaM ~Mvaruṇa̍ daivyE janE&BidrOhaM̍ manuṣyA̱ścarA̍masi|aci̍ttIyat̍ tava dharmA# yuyOpimamA nastasmA dEnasO̍ dEva rIriṣaḥ||kitavAsO yadri# ripurna dIvi yadvA# GA satya mutayanna vidma|sarvA tA viṣya# śithirE ( ) va# dEvAthA# tE syAma varuṇa priyAsaḥ||46̍ praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 11 anuvAkams :- (vi vA EtasyA - &&vAyO̍ - imE vai - citta~jcA - &gnirBUtAnA̱M - dEvA vA aByAtAnA̍ - nRutAṣAḍ̍ - rAṣṭrakAmAya̍ - dEvikA̍ - vAstO̱ṣpatE - tvamagnE̍ bRuha - dEkAdaśa̍ ) korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (vi vA EtasyE - tyAha̍ - mRutyurgandharvO̍ - &va# rundhE maddhyata - stvamagnE̍ bRuhath - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśat)̍ first and last padam of Fourth praśnam of kAṇḍam 3 :- (vi vA Etasya# - priyAsaḥ̍ )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM tRutIyakAṇḍE caturthaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||3.5 tRutIyakAṇḍE pa~jcamaḥ praśnaḥ - iṣṭiśEṣABidhAnaM
